title: Topic 001 Question 077
body: A company runs an application that hosts critical data for several clients. The company uses AWS CloudTrail to track user activities on various AWS resources. To meet new security requirements, the company needs to protect the CloudTrail log files from being modified, deleted, or forged.
Which solution will meet these requirement?
options: Enable CloudTrail log file integrity validation.
Use Amazon S3 MFA Delete on the S3 bucket where the CloudTrail log files are stored.
Use Amazon S3 Versioning to keep all versions of the CloudTrail log files.
Use AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) security keys to secure the CloudTrail log files.
